Text: Thanks AiTP...I'm glad Monk is back, but at the same time, I'm saddened b/c this is the last season.  I'm also glad that they will have had plenty of time to wrap the show up.

Question??? Why rar files? I do a lot of uploading (click on my username) and a NEVER rar. It's completely unnecessary and only causes suspicion on the files being uploaded. I wish websites like TPB and Mininova would ban them.
Thank you very much AiTB and for the remark that jwhitt made... just unrar and enjoy it pal.
